label: ZMNHAA
info_overview: This Z-Wave module is used for switching on or off the electrical device (e.g. light, fan, etc ...). The module can be controlled either through Z-wave network or through the wall switch.
info_inclusion:
• press service button S for more than 2 second or
  • press push button I1 three times within 3s (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds).
info_exclusion:
• press service button S for more than 6 second or
  • press push button I1 five times within 3s (5 times change switch state within 3 seconds) in the first 60 seconds after the module is connected to the power supply.
approved_export:

category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameters.description: ctivate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameters.overview: Flush 1 relay module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system.

options.label: ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

parameters.label: Automatic turning off relay after set time
parameters.description: Automatic turning off relay after set time
parameters.overview:
Default value 0

  •  0 - Auto OFF disabled
  •  1 – 65535 = 0,01second – 655,35 seconds Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 10mseconds.

parameters.label: Relay state after a power failure
parameters.description: Relay state after a power failure

parameters.label: Power reporting in Watts on percentage change
parameters.description: Power reporting in Watts on percentage change
parameters.overview:
• 0 – Reporting Disabled
  • 1 – 100 = 1% - 100% Reporting enabled

Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time changes for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%

parameters.label: Power reporting in Watts on power change
parameters.description: Power reporting in Watts on power change
parameters.overview:
• default value 300 (power report in Watts is send each 300s)
  • 0 – Reporting Disabled
  • 1 – 65535 = 1second – 65535 seconds.

Reporting enabled. Power report is send with time interval set by entered value.

associations.label: basic on/off
associations.description: triggered at change of the output Q state and reflecting its state

associations.label: basic on/off -  input I2
associations.description: (triggered at change of the input I2 state and reflecting its state)

associations.label: basic on/off -  input I3
associations.description: ttriggered at change of the input I3 state and reflecting its state)

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.
